labels.imageAnalysisHelper: Describe how the AI should analyze each slide image
labels.companyOfferingHelper: Describe how the AI should extract company summary and offering

messages.noTemplatesAvailable: No templates available for this sector

pipeline.title: Obligatory Extractions
pipeline.description: Configure the prompts used for extracting essential information from pitch decks. These prompts control how the AI processes and understands the content.
pipeline.imageAnalysisDescription: This prompt is used by the vision AI model to describe each slide of the pitch deck. It forms the foundation for all subsequent analysis steps.
pipeline.companyOfferingDescription: This prompt controls how the AI extracts and summarizes the company's core offering and business model from the pitch deck content.
pipeline.resetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset this prompt to its default value?
